titleStmt.title: Letter from John G. Neihardt to Hilda Neihardt, JAnuary 23, 1934
titleStmt.author: Neihardt, John G.

publicationStmt.authority: The Papers of John G. Neihardt

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Letter from John G. Neihardt to Hilda Neihardt, JAnuary 23, 1934

msIdentifier.repository: John G. Neihardt Center Research Library, Aly Collection

div1.fw: BREEN HOTEL M.J. BREEN, MGR. St. Cloud, Minn.

One of the Finest in the Northwest 175 Rooms Strictly Fireproof
BREEN HOTEL H.J. BREEN, MGR. St. Cloud, Minn.
div1.p: Mama sent on your letter about the fix you have been in, and I'm more soryr than I can say, I can't see how it happened, unless my first letter containing money and map reach you - or maybe it was the second. Anyway, I don't want it ot happen again! Surely there is no need of it, I've had a very fine trip. Will read here tonight & catch the 5:50 tain for Minneapolis tomorrow morning, then take the 9:20 train from there for Grinnell. Will reach home Thursday. (over)

30 I went into that place in Minneapolis & saw the with holster that was advertised. It is practically new - no sign of wear anywhere inside or outside. I wanted it a lot, but of course it would be foolish to buy it. The weather has been five up here - even at Moorhead what is as far worth as Duluth. I arrived for the January thaw. They have had 30 below at Moorhead 25 at Minneapolis Endless love, Hiddy, Dad, Comradely greetings to Elanita! 2 I am really happy about much, and you are a large part of the muchness! Had an ambrosial evening with Dr. Richard Scammon, Dean of Medical Sciences at U. of Minnesota. he is a very distinguished man. You know, he is my old "Dick"- one of my best boyhood chums, We were inseparable as she ages of 9 & 10. We got together in five shops. He & his son & their University crowd are flaming Reds. The song is leader of the Farmen Labor Party in Minnesota, & he is only 18! the kid is 5ft. 5 1/2 in tall & weighs 260 lbs, also, he has a brain big enough for a such a body. I feel he will get killed early in teh inevitable row. But he will be heard from How they, & another Prof., did endorse my prophetic guesses. (over)
div1.fw:
One of the Finest in the Northwest 175 Rooms Strictly Fireproof
BREEN HOTEL H.J. BREEN, MGR. St. Cloud, Minn.
div1.p: P.S. 10:30 P.M. same day! Am through here. Swede audience, or at least very largely swede. They fell for it as usual, & called me from behind the curtain when I had really quit. They are not so quoteably civilized here as in Moorehead - Fargo, but they are quite all right. Hiddy, I've just read yoiur lette rover two glasses of beer after the show. It's a great letter, Old Kid! I needn't tell you how dear you are to me & how highly I appraise you. Hiddy, it's a shame you had to be chagrined for each of money! It mustnt be.
